\section{Introduction}
This report references prior work in \cite{smith2024} and \citep{doe2023}.

\subsection{Background}
The baseline appears in Figure~\ref{fig:pipeline} and Equation~\eqref{eq:score}.

\section{Method}
\subsection{Dataset}
We derive features from normalized telemetry and aggregate by service tier.

\subsubsection{Feature Extraction}
Features include request rate, tail latency, and queue depth.

\begin{equation}
\label{eq:score}
score = \frac{tp}{tp + 0.5(fp + fn)}
\end{equation}

\section{Results}
Results improve over baseline in both precision and recall.

\section{Conclusion}
Future work should evaluate adaptation under topology shifts.
